level.text: The licensed organization shall guarantee each ticket a fair and equal chance at the draw.
A licensed organization shall guarantee to ticket holders access to the area of the raffle draw.
The raffle draw and preparation for the raffle draw of a winning ticket or tickets shall be clearly visible to those in attendance.
Winners need not be present at the draw. The licensed organization shall notify the winners in writing within five (5) days, excluding Saturdays, Sundays and holidays, after the raffle draw.
Each raffle winner shall be determined and every prize indicated on the application shall be awarded at the conclusion of the raffle draw at the time and place stated on the license.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to May 20, 1988, the D.C. Lottery and Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 5016, 5036 (November 12, 1982).
